page.title: 11BRITISH CAR AUCTIONS
page.content: BRITISH CAR AUCTIONS IS SITUATED ON THE A3, SOUTH OF HINDHEAD CROSS ROADS. THE COMPANY IS BASED IN A LARGE HOUSE WHICH STANDS IN THREE AND A HALF ACRES OF GROUNDS. THE COMPANY, WHICH WAS FOUNDED IN I946, NOW HAS FOURTEEN DIFFERENT CENTRES IN BRITAIN. ORIGINALLY THE HEAD OFFICE OF THIS INDUSTRY WAS IN FARNHAM BUT THE OFFICES WERE IN TWO DIFFERENT BUILDINGS. THEY CHOSE TO MOVE THEIR HEAD OFFICE TO HINDHEAD BECAUSE IT HAD A LARGE CAR PARK WITH A GOOD AXIS FOR THEIR BOSS'S HELICOPTER, AND IT WAS THE ONLY AVAILABLE BUILDING WITH ADEQUATE SPACE FOR A PUBLIC COMPANY. AT EXPEDIER HOUSE, HINDHEAD, THE ADMINISTRATION. SALES AND ACCOUNTING IS DONE. NINETY SIX PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED HERE.
